ygData.subject: Re: Astrotrain
ygData.msgSnippet: Spasstik hopped out of Astrotrain, snarling through his clenched jaw. The small firearm began to speak, although quite weakly. Excellent, you made it away

Spasstik hopped out of Astrotrain, snarling through his clenched jaw.
The small firearm began to speak, although quite weakly. "Excellent, you
made it away Blindfear. I have been monitoring Abominus' progress in the
ocean. I need you to head into the water and tell him to stop, or he
will overshoot his needed position. Spasstik, get me to the repair
chamber. Astrotrain, check on Soundwave." At that Spasstik quickly
padded his way into the base, towards Switchblade's laboritory, with his
weakened leader still in his jaw.

He rounded two corners, then into the elevator. It dropped downwards,
then opened up as the wolf emerged from the doorway, and headed down a
long coridoor with many rooms on the sides, getting much more technical
with more and more equipment in each one, until he reached the end, and
entered a doorway on his right.

Spasstik emerged in Switchblade's room, and the small pistol spoke
again. "Fix me." it weakly hissed, as the wolf stood there snarling in
the doorway, protective of the gun.
